title: PAC analysis
extract: Envelope Analysis (not discuss here) PAC, PXF, and PNOISE are similar in concept to AC, XF, and Noise. However, they are applied to periodically-driven circuits such as mixers and oscillators.
extract_html: Envelope Analysis (not discuss here) PAC, PXF, and PNOISE are similar in concept to AC, XF, and Noise. However, they are applied to periodically-driven circuits such as mixers and oscillators.
